parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attaches entity to the rope end with optional offset. For detach operation use [[ropeDetach]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>[entity, toPoint, ropeEndDownVector] [[ropeAttachTo]] rope

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [entity, toPoint, ropeEndDownVector]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> entity: [[Object]] - entity to be attached to the end of rope

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> toPoint (Optional):  [[String]] or [[Array]] - position for the rope end, either a memory point [[String]] or relative offset [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> ropeEndDownVector (Optional): [[String]] or [[Array]], either a memory point [[String]] or relative vector [[Array]]. If [[String]] is given, then <tt>ropeEndDownVector</tt> is calculated from <tt>toPoint</tt> towards <tt>ropeEndDownVector</tt> memory point. Default: [0,0,-1]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> rope: [[Object]] - the rope to which entity will be attached to

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[veh1, [0,0,0], [0,0,-1]] [[ropeAttachTo]] ([[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
